scripts.start: mkdir -p /logs; npm run getPathVariables npm run configureForever main.js
scripts.startDev: mkdir -p /logs; npm run configureDev; npm run getPathVariables node main.js --debug
scripts.getPathVariables: ENV_NAME=`npm config get ENV_NAME` WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` PAIR_CODE=`npm config get PAIR_CODE` SIMULATION=`npm config get SIMULATION`
scripts.configureDev: npm config set ENV_NAME dev; npm config set WALLET_ID eth_alt2; npm config set PAIR_CODE eth_alt1; npm config set SIMULATION false;
scripts.balance: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/getBalance.js
scripts.logWalletBalance: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/logWalletBalance.js
scripts.sendCoins: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/sendCoins.js
scripts.consolidateCoins: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/consolidateCoins.js
scripts.consolidateEther: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/consolidateEther.js
scripts.disperseCoins: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/disperseCoins.js
scripts.disperseEther: WALLET_ID=`npm config get WALLET_ID` node scripts/disperseEther.js
